mapper.select: SELECT MSD.COMPANY_CD , MSD.DIVISION_CD , MSD.SHIPPING_NO , MSD.SEQ , MSD.SHIPPING_ORDER_ID , MSD.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MSD.COMPANY_CD, MSD.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MSD.SHIPPING_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MSD.COMPANY_CD, MSD.DIVISION_CD, MSD.SHIPPING_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS SHIPPING_UOM_NM , MSD.QTY AS SHIPPING_QTY , MSD.UNIT_PRICE , MSD.CONVERSION_QTY , MSD.CONVERSION_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MSD.COMPANY_CD, MSD.DIVISION_CD, MSD.CONVERSION_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS CONVERSION_UOM_NM , MSD.AMOUNT , MSD.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MSD.REFERENCE_NO AS SO_NO , MSD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO AS SALES_ORDER_ID , MSD.IO_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_IO_TYPE_NAME(MSD.COMPANY_CD, MSD.DIVISION_CD, MSD.IO_TYPE) FROM DUAL) AS IO_TYPE_NM , ROWIDTOCHAR(MSD.ROWID) AS KEY_ID , MSD.DESCRIPTION , MSD.UPDATE_BY AS UPDATE_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MSD.COMPANY_CD, MSD.DIVISION_CD, MSD.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATE_USER_NM , TO_CHAR(MSD.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM MOM_SHIPPING_ORDER_DTL MSD , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MSD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MSD.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MSD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MSD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MSD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MSD.SHIPPING_NO = #{shippingNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
